item.title: Google Trends using gtrends and R shiny
item.description: Recently while I was searching for trend data I came across Google Trends. So in the post I am using gtrends, a r package to understand the trends and display it using a R shiny app using the shinymaterial package. The shinymaterial package tends to move away from the traditional shiny dashboard layouts and design…

item.title: States to Shapes
item.description: I started working on this visualation after coming across Mike Bostock’s shape tweening bl.ock , which was done for one state. The source for this data is Insurance Institute for Highway Service(IIHS). The size of the square is based on the motor vehicle deaths per 100,000 people(2015). …

item.title: Harry Potter Characters.

item.title: NFL Season 2016-17
item.description: Hello World !!! This is my first project using d3js. Being a GIS professional, visualization is always a part of job. I always wanted to learn different ways for visualizing data.Let it be a simple plot using R or a choropleth map using Arcmap . In this project I am trying to display how the NFL season 2016-17 went about…
